title: Stunning 3bd/2.5ba w/ private roof deck, central AC & laundry in unit
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 253553921', 'Rent: $4,100 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 2.5', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Welcome to this beautiful, condo quality, 3 bedroom 2.5 bathroom DUPLEX unit with private roof deck and sweeping views!!', 'Apartment is just under 1,600 SF and features a stunning layout.', 'Large bedrooms.', 'Master bedroom includes en-suite bathroom and HUGE WALK IN closet.', 'Perfect for roommates or a couple that needs to work from home and needs to have a guest room and home office.', 'Open kitchen and living room layout.', 'The kitchen features modern cabinetry and stainless steal appliances.', 'All bedrooms include well-sized closets.', 'Washer/Dryer located in unit!', 'Central air-conditioning, forced hot air and hardwood floors throughout complete this rare offering.', 'Just 2 stops on the newly renovated blue line to Aquarium, 3 stops to State Street.', 'Also just an ten minute walk to the Maverick T stop.', 'Grocery, shopping, gyms/yoga studio and restaurants all within a few blocks from your front door.', 'FEATURES', 'Central Air', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Eat-In Kitchen', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'Outdoor space', 'Oven/Range', 'Private outdoor space', 'Refrigerator']
